original: @255a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @255a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:ðŸ”½ÅšrÄ«gurubhavanaratnastotra

original: shr'i gu ru ba na ratna sto tra sa bta kam / bod skad du /
analyzed: shr'i gu ru ba na ratna sto tra sa bta kam / bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa //
translated: The Seven Praises of the Glorious Guru Vanaratna

original: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the feet of the glorious guru Vanaratna!

original: bal po'i yul gyi rgyal po bde bar gshegs pa yi //
analyzed: bal po'i yul gyi rgyal po bde bar gshegs pa yi //
translated: The king of Nepal, Sugata,

original: lugs la rtag tu rjes su brtson pa la bkod cing //ðŸ”½mkhas pa rnams kyi mdzod gyur mthar thug yon tan gyi //
analyzed: lugs la rtag tu rjes su brtson pa la bkod cing // mkhas pa rnams kyi mdzod gyur mthar thug yon tan gyi //
translated: was always established in the practice of the Dharma,ðŸ”½and the monk-king, who illuminated the profound assembly of ultimate qualities,

original: tshogs kyi zab mo snang mdzad dge slong rgyal po ste //
analyzed: tshogs kyi zab mo snang mdzad dge slong rgyal po ste //
translated: the treasury of the wise,

original: rnam par grags shing ma chungs pa med pa'i grags pa yi //
analyzed: rnam par grags shing ma chungs pa med pa'i grags pa yi //
translated: the banner of fame that is never diminished,

original: rgyal mtshan bla bre dar dpyangs zab cing rgya che'i blo //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan bla bre dar dpyangs zab cing rgya che'i blo //
translated: with a mind vast and profound,ðŸ”½was the sole refuge for all beings.

original: sku yang sems can rnams kyi skyabs ni gcig pu ste //
analyzed: sku yang sems can rnams kyi skyabs ni gcig pu ste //
translated: The sole refuge for all beings,

original: theg chen yang dag rtogs pas grub pa'i mtha' yi mdzod //
analyzed: theg chen yang dag rtogs pas grub pa'i mtha' yi mdzod //
translated: the treasury of the tenets established by the perfect realization of the Great Vehicle,

original: nags kyi rin chen zhes bya sdom brtson mchog gi blo //
analyzed: nags kyi rin chen zhes bya sdom brtson mchog gi blo //
translated: the mind of the supreme practitioner of discipline, called Vanaratna,

original: gnas brtan 'di na gnyis med chos kyi de nyid rig /'dul ba'i sdom pas yang dag sdom la mngon par brtson //
analyzed: gnas brtan 'di na gnyis med chos kyi de nyid rig /'dul ba'i sdom pas yang dag sdom la mngon par brtson //
translated: This elder knows the reality of non-duality, and is diligent in being restrained by the restraint of the Vinaya.

original: phas rgol glang po'i dbang la ri dags rgyal po lags //
analyzed: phas rgol glang po'i dbang la ri dags rgyal po lags //
translated: He is the king of beasts to the elephant-like opponents.

original: phyag 'tshal sdom brtson chen po'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchog / mchog gi tshul la rab tu rnam par nges pa skye //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal sdom brtson chen po'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchog / mchog gi tshul la rab tu rnam par nges pa skye //
translated: Homage to the one who is the supreme king of the greatly diligent in vows, who gives rise to perfect ascertainment in the supreme way,

original: skye ba sdug bsngal dag las 'byin byed gcig pu mchog / mchog tu nags kyi rin chen gnas brtan chen po lags //
analyzed: skye ba sdug bsngal dag las 'byin byed gcig pu mchog / mchog tu nags kyi rin chen gnas brtan chen po lags //
translated: The sole supreme one who liberates from the suffering of birth, the supreme great elder who is the jewel of the forest.

original: chags bral sems can ma lus pa dag sad par mdzad //
analyzed: chags bral sems can ma lus pa dag sad par mdzad //
translated: He awakens all beings who are free from attachment.

original: phyag gi chu skyes dag gis mtshon gyi gzhu 'chang ba //
analyzed: phyag gi chu skyes dag gis mtshon gyi gzhu 'chang ba //
translated: He holds the bow of the weapon with the lotus of his hand.

original: 'dzin pa'i mthil gyi rgyan du gyur pa mdzes pa'i sku //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i mthil gyi rgyan du gyur pa mdzes pa'i sku //
translated: His beautiful body becomes an ornament on the palm of the holder.

original: gnas brten chen po nags kyi rin chen rab tu mdzes //ðŸ”½dga' bral dga' ba'i glang po la sog dri ma yi //
analyzed: gnas brten chen po nags kyi rin chen rab tu mdzes // dga' bral dga' ba'i glang po la sog dri ma yi //
translated: The great elder is the beautiful jewel of the forest.ðŸ”½The elephant of detachment and so on experiences

original: dri ma dri ma @255b med cing bral ba nyams su myong //
analyzed: dri ma dri ma @255b med cing bral ba nyams su myong //
translated: The smell of the smell that is free from stains and free from stains.

original: srid dang srid pa ma yin gnyis kyi 'ben la mnga' //
analyzed: srid dang srid pa ma yin gnyis kyi 'ben la mnga' //
translated: You are skilled in the two targets, existence and non-existence.

original: gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen skyabs su gyur //
analyzed: gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen skyabs su gyur //
translated: You are the great elder Vanaratna, the protector.

original: dga' bral dang po'i bdud rtsi'i btud pa bdag la dgyes //
analyzed: dga' bral dang po'i bdud rtsi'i btud pa bdag la dgyes //
translated: I am delighted by the first nectar of separation from joy.

original: dgyes shing nges la dul ba'i yan lag brgya phrag gis //
analyzed: dgyes shing nges la dul ba'i yan lag brgya phrag gis //
translated: With a hundred branches of joy, certainty, and discipline,ðŸ”½You ripen a hundred assemblies of beings.

original: sems can brgya phrag tshogs rnams yongs su smin pa dag / rtsi mdzad gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen no //ðŸ”½bdud sde la sogs rnams kyi kha la ro med mdzad //
analyzed: sems can brgya phrag tshogs rnams yongs su smin pa dag / rtsi mdzad gnas brtan chen po nags kyi rin chen no // bdud sde la sogs rnams kyi kha la ro med mdzad //
translated: You are the great elder Vanaratna, the healer.ðŸ”½You make the mouths of the demon hordes and others tasteless.

original: kha yi chu skyes dag ni dgra yis gang ba 'dzems //
analyzed: kha yi chu skyes dag ni dgra yis gang ba 'dzems //
translated: You avoid filling the lotus of the mouth with the enemy.

original: skye mched 'dar ba'i phas rgol ri yi dbang po 'khru //
analyzed: skye mched 'dar ba'i phas rgol ri yi dbang po 'khru //
translated: The father-enemy of trembling sense bases shakes the lord of mountains.

original: khrus mdzad nags kyi rin chen gnas brtan chen po'o //
analyzed: khrus mdzad nags kyi rin chen gnas brtan chen po'o //
translated: You are the great elder Vanaratna, the one who bathes.

original: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa 'di ni rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma nags kyi rin chen gyi bstod pa bdun pa 'di ni rdzogs so /
translated: This praise of the glorious guru Vanaratna is complete.

original: // / yul ma ga dh'a nas byung ba'i dge bsnyen dam pa nyi ma pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: // / yul ma ga dh'a nas byung ba'i dge bsnyen dam pa nyi ma pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa'o //
translated: It was composed by the upasaka of Magadha named Suryaprabha.

original: 'di ni spyan mnga' chos kyi rgyal pos gser gyi me tog dang bcas pa'i bka' lung gis //
analyzed: 'di ni spyan mnga' chos kyi rgyal pos gser gyi me tog dang bcas pa'i bka' lung gis //
translated: This was spoken by the Dharma King with the eyes, along with the golden flower.

original: rtse thang lo ts'a ba gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: rtse thang lo ts'a ba gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: This was translated by the Tibetan translator Shonu Pal, who was from Tsethang, by the command of the Dharma King with the gift of gold.
